entities.name: the wandmaker
entities.description: The wandmaker is a person who examines and identifies the wands. He is described as taking the first of the wands and holding it close to his faded eyes, rolling it between his knobble-knuckled fingers, flexing it slightly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who asks the wandmaker if he can identify the wands. He is described as taking one of the wands and possibly making it his own.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is a person whose wand was identified by the wandmaker. The wand is described as being made of walnut and dragon heartstring.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a person whose wand was identified by the wandmaker. The wand is described as being made of hawthorn and unicorn hair.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is a person who performs the same examination as the wandmaker.

relationships.description: Harry took the wand from Draco Malfoy, which may have changed the allegiance of the wand.
The wand belonged to Bellatrix Lestrange.
The wand was the property of Draco Malfoy.
The wand may belong to Harry, depending on how he took it.
